Title: The Warrior Class
Writer: Jonathan Tropper (created by), David Schickler (created by), Evan Dunsky
Actors: Antony Starr, Ivana Milicevic, Ulrich Thomsen, Frankie Faison
Plot: A young Kinaho girl is murdered on Amish land. She was seeing Soloman, the little brother of Rebecca. Hostilities ensue between the Kinaho and the Amish. Proctor comes to the aid of his people. Hood has a surprising visitor from his past.
